nodes.text: Hangar 25 was a hangar located at the Outer Rim Peragus Mining Facility during the Old Sith Wars. In 3951 BBY, during the Dark Wars, T3-M4 docked there in the Ebon Hawk after the Harbinger, bound for Telos IV, was infiltrated by Sith assassins lead by Darth Sion. Jedi exile Meetra Surik later escaped from Sion with T3-M4 and Atton Rand in the docked Ebon Hawk.
